body_html:
Right, this worked for me. Sorry, I guess I got confused and used the python 2 link instead of python 3. Using the following command line worked (as outlined in Install documentation):
sudo pip3 install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.6.0-py3-none-any.whl

body:
Right, this worked for me. Sorry, I guess I got confused and used the python 2 link instead of python 3. Using the following command line worked (as outlined in Install documentation): 
sudo pip3 install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.6.0-py3-none-any.whl
